text: Sheikh Ahmed bin Ali bin Abdulla Al Khalifa () is a Bahraini businessman. He is a member of Bahrain's Royal family, the Al Khalifa family. He is the Chairman of Board of Al-Muharraq SC. He also is the chairman of Zain Bahrain. Board Chairman of Muharrq Club Congratulates Wise LeadershipZain Bahrain plans regionâ€™s first LTE network Ahmed bin Ali bin Abdulla Al Khalifa ==Early life and career== Ahmed was born in Muharraq Governorate. He started his business career in Bahrain through the chairmanship of the boards of companies. It includes Zain Bahrain, Al Areen Desert Resort, and Al Areen Holding Company. He served as Vice Chairman of Al Muharraq Club from 1978 to 1989. He currently serves as its chairman since April 1994. == References == Category:Living people Category:Muharraq Governorate Category:Bahraini people
title: Ahmed bin Ali bin Abdulla Al Khalifa
